stitches for crotch knit across second leg cast on 3 3 4 4 4 stitches for crotch knit to rm 122 126 132 140 144 stitches join to knit in the round and continue in st st in stripe pattern until work measures 4½ 5½ 6½ 7½ 8½ from crotch carry the yarn at the back of the work between stripes catching it with the working yarn at the beginning of the third round of a stripe and taking care not to pull the held yarn too tight use a jogless join for smooth colour changes between stripes see below jogless join to avoid the jog when changing colours in the round use a jogless join technique knit one round of the new colour when you get to the first stick of the second round pick up one stitch from the row below in the old colour and knit it together with the first stitch this stretches the last stitch of the previous colour and helps to hide the join unlike other jogless join techniques this one keeps the start of the round in the same place see https //www lovecrafts
